short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes words have emphasis 'Lead-In' bolding to make words on screen easier for readers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you read web pages easier as emphasized words that have the first half of the word bolded to make it easier to quickly read information.
